author: luc
msg: Fixed misleading javadoc, the user supplied min and max step size are internally forced to positive and integration direction is handled later on. Asking for a positive step size was superfluous.

author: simonetripodi
msg: TestKeyedObjectPoolFactory (and related subclasses) tests moved to JUnit4 annotations

author: clement
msg: The ipojo.processing.synchronous=true system property disables the thread used by iPOJO to process bundles.
